mobile.questionText: How do I get the app?
mobile.answer: You can download the app from the App Store or Google Play Store

mobile.questionText: Do you have a QR code for the app?
mobile.answer: Yes we have a QR code for the app
No the app  does not work offline,Wifi/Data is required to use the app

tutorial.questionText: How do I use the map in the desktop application?
tutorial.answer: first you need to click on the map icon on the left side of the screen,then you can use the map
